name: A Different World (GameWithSoham)
description:
Hey Gamers!

I am a 14 yr old and this is my second published game.

This is a horror game where you need to capture the ghosts of Tim, the clown, and escape his house.

You are actually a paranormal expert and can view in paranormal mode and normal mode.

In Paranormal mode you can see Tim's ghosts but can't see Tim.

With your wand capture all Tim's ghosts and find the levers and keys to escape his house.

Disclaimer: Tim can attack in any mode you are in!

Best Of Luck!

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move.

Mouse to look around.

Left Click Mouse to attack.

'E' to interact with doors and levers.

'F' to turn on/off Paranormal mode.
